mapinfo.detailsText:
The Fertile Crescent,also known as the cradle of civilization, is a crescent-shaped region in Mesopotamia. The map is surrounded by two rivers crossed by trade roads that go in front of sufi settlements. 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -NativeCiv: Sufi 
 -Outlaws: Dacoit / Thuggee 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Map designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
